io.description: state handler for managing the conversation

continue.description: Continues the response through reprompting | For when you need to do a certain action based on the output of a call

end.description: Terminates response | For when the user's request is satisfied

list_sheets.description: Get a list of all sheets in the document with their metadata

read_sheet.description: Read content from a specific sheet, returns values and formulas in A1 notation

parameters.name: sheet_name
parameters.description: Name of the sheet to read. If omitted, reads the first sheet.

write_cells.description: Write values and/or formulas to specific cells using A1 notation

parameters.name: cells
parameters.description: JSON string mapping A1 cell notation to value/formula objects
